Text:
Is it just me, or does this not work?
The nfo file doesn't open, and the movie doesn't play.
Think this is the first time I've come across a corrupted upload here.
Not to worry, keep up the good work DownTYU.

@8ozzo
I dont know which player you use...
But it is playing just fine in VLC...take a look at the screen
http://image.bayimg.com/eakgoaadc.jpg

Work perfect, thanks.
I'm using the latest Combined-Community-Codec-Pack-2011-07-30 with Media Player Classic Home Cinema, and CoreAVC 2.5.1.
I was getting a blank screen, and the movie going straight to paused.
However, I cleaned it up using MKVmerge 4.9.1, removing the extra audio tracks, and all subtitles, as well as disabling 'header removal compression for audio and video tracks'.
For a second there, I almost installed VLC.
Sorry for troubling you, my mistake. :)
Thank you for taking the time to reply, promptly too.
